module, schematic, drawing, page connector
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to define a schematic drawing and its administrative information. A schematic drawing is a schematic element that is a complete drawing.
This part of ISO 10303 also defines page connectors, which provide the links between different schematic drawings, or between different parts of the same schematic drawing.
a complete schematic drawing with its administrative data;
page connectors, and their relationships.
a library of schematic element definitions (i.e. a symbol library); A library of schematic element definitions is within the scope of the Schematic_element_library application module.
the relationship between a schematic element and the thing that it stands for. The relationship between a schematic element and a product or activity that it stands for is within the scope of the Symbolization_by_schematic_element application module.
The Schematic_drawing UoF specifies administrative data for a schematic element that is a complete schematic drawing.
The Page_connectors UoF defines the schematic elements that provide the links between different schematic drawings, or between different parts of the same schematic drawing.
